Package com.esri.mo2.util

This package has various utility classes that couldn't easily be classified.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
LRUObject Implements an object to be manipulated by the LRU List.
MessageListener An interface for objects requesting to be notified about MessageEvents.
PropertiesFileLocator Provides a means for locating one or more Properties files from a collection of Properties files.
 

Class Summary
BasePropertiesResourceFileLocator Consists of a single resource file that contains references to other resource files.
BaseUtil This class contains some basic utilities useful in various places of MO Java framework
BigEndian Handles byte-swapping between binary numbers in different ENDIAN systems.
BitArray Manages a growable array of bits.
Box Manages a rectangular area
ByteList A resizeable list of bytes.
Capabilities The Capabilities class defines a collection of capabilities.
Capability A Capability is a boolean object property that can be referenced by index or name.
Channel A Channel is an intermediate object between a producer and a consumer.
Date Provides a consistent way to format a Date for display in JFC components.
DiscoverName This class finds filenames the match a pattern and also match case insensitive file extensions.
DoubleCollection An UNSYNCHRONIZED variable growing array of doubles.
EmptyCursor Implementation of an empty data cursor.
Endian Handles special cases of binary number conversions.
Environment This class can be used to store and manage the Environment data that is sent between an ArcIMS server and its client.
EventMulticaster Provides support for managing EventListeners using the techniques described in the JavaWorld article Java Tip 79: Interact with garbage collector to avoid memory leaks, which provide a way to prevent memory leakages when the owners of EventListeners wish to be garbage-collected, but are prevented by a Multicaster, because it holds strong references to the listener, and hence to the owner of that listener.
FloatingPointCompare Performs floating point comparisons between two numbers with an epsilon.
History Maintains a history of objects in a user session and supports adding and retrieving them in a Web browser fashion.
IntegerBox Manages a rectangular area of integer coordinates
IntegerList Resizeable list of Integers.
IteratorCursor Wraps a java.util.Iterator as a Cursor.
IteratorImpl Implements a java.util.Iterator that iterates through a linked list of objects.
LittleEndian Handles the conversion of binary numbers and byte arrays stored in LITTLE ENDIAN format.
LRU LRU is a collection that manages a finite set of objects based on Least-Recently-Used algorithm.
MessageCentre Provides a convenient central location to gather and disseminate messages.
MessageEvent This event is sent to a MessageListener whenever the MessageCentre broadcasts a message.
Mosaic Provides a difference method for Envelopes for DisplayManager and FeatureCache, that produces the result as a collection of envelopes.
NameValuePair This class keeps (name,value) String pairs which can be added to a Strings collection.
ReadOnlyIterator This class guarantees read-only access to a wrapped java.util.Iterator.
Resource Simple-to-use access methods for Class resources that are stored within a JAR.
RWLock This Lock allows multiple threads to read a data structure simultaneously, but allows only one writer to lock out the readers from updating the structure.
Strings A light-weight collection of String objects that can be accessed by index.
Units This class stores some common units.
 

Exception Summary
UiFontException This Exception may be sent to MessageCentre, if a UiFont needed for display of textual information is not present on the client system.
 

Package com.esri.mo2.util Description

This package has various utility classes that couldn't easily be classified. It provides way to format dates, maintain History of objects, Messagecentre to gather and disseminate messages and various other utility classes.
